title: SET_PAD_SHAKE
content:
0x48B3886C1358D0D50x5D38BD2F// SetPadShake
void SET_PAD_SHAKE(int padIndex, int duration, int frequency);p0 always seems to be 0  
duration in milliseconds   
frequency should range from about 10 (slow vibration) to 255 (very fast)  
example:  
SET_PAD_SHAKE(0, 100, 200);
codeBlocks:
// SetPadShake

p0 always seems to be 0  
duration in milliseconds   
frequency should range from about 10 (slow vibration) to 255 (very fast)  
example:
